languages.text: {n}Высокий техножрец, что обратился к вам, выглядит более мирно и демонстративно не достает оружие. В том, с какой частотой он инспектирует взглядом состояние своего спутника, чувствуется беспокойство.{/n}

{n}The tall Tech-Priest who spoke to you looks more peaceful and makes a point of not drawing his weapon. There is an air of concern about the way he frequently glances over at his fellow, scrutinising his condition.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Высокий техножрец, что обратился к вам, выглядит более мирно и демонстративно не достает оружие. В том, с какой частотой он инспектирует взглядом состояние своего спутника, чувствуется беспокойство.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The tall Tech-Priest who spoke to you looks more peaceable and makes a point of not drawing his weapon. There's an air of concern about the way he frequently glances over at his fellow, inspecting his state.{/n}
traits.speaker: Opticon22

traits.speaker: Opticon22

traits.locale_text: {n}The tall Tech-Priest who spoke to you looks more peaceful and makes a point of not drawing his weapon. There is an air of concern about the way he frequently glances over at his fellow, scrutinising his condition.{/n}
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: {n}あなたに話し掛ける長身の技術司祭は穏やかな様子であり、また武器は取り出さないと主張した。仲間の状態を頻繁に確認するその様子からは、懸念が見てとれる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tall Tech-Priest who spoke to you looks more peaceful and makes a point of not drawing his weapon. There is an air of concern about the way he frequently glances over at his fellow, scrutinising his condition.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたに話し掛ける長身の技術司祭は穏やかな様子であり、また武器は取り出さないと主張した。仲間の状態を頻繁に確認するその様子からは、懸念が見てとれる。{/n}
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: {n}身边瘦高个子的技术神甫看起来更加平和，而且非常注重礼节，没有拔出武器。他时不时地留意他身边的大块头同伴，仔细查看他的情况。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tall Tech-Priest who spoke to you looks more peaceful and makes a point of not drawing his weapon. There is an air of concern about the way he frequently glances over at his fellow, scrutinising his condition.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}身边瘦高个子的技术祭司看起来更加平和，而且非常注重礼节，没有拔出武器。他时不时地留意他身边的大块头同伴，检查他的情况，脸上流露出关切的神色。{/n}
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: {n}Der große Techpriester, der mit dir gesprochen hat, wirkt friedlicher und zieht seine Waffe nicht. Immer wieder wirft er einen besorgten Blick zurück auf seinen Gefährten und dessen Zustand.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tall Tech-Priest who spoke to you looks more peaceful and makes a point of not drawing his weapon. There is an air of concern about the way he frequently glances over at his fellow, scrutinising his condition.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der große Techpriester, der mit dir gesprochen hat, wirkt friedlicher und zieht seine Waffe nicht. Immer wieder wirft er einen besorgten Blick zurück auf seinen Gefährten und dessen Zustand.{/n}
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: {n}Le grand technoprêtre qui s'est adressé à vous semble plus calme et met un point d'honneur à ne pas dégainer son arme. Vous décelez une certaine inquiétude dans les regards fréquents qu'il jette à son compagnon, comme s'il cherchait à évaluer son état.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tall Tech-Priest who spoke to you looks more peaceful and makes a point of not drawing his weapon. There is an air of concern about the way he frequently glances over at his fellow, scrutinising his condition.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le grand technoprêtre qui s'est adressé à vous semble plus calme et met un point d'honneur à ne pas dégainer son arme. Vous décelez une certaine inquiétude dans les regards fréquents qu'il jette à son compagnon, comme s'il cherchait à évaluer son état.{/n}
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: {n}El imponente tecnosacerdote que te habló parece más sosegado y deja claro que no tiene intención de desenfundar su arma. Se te antoja preocupante el modo en que lanza frecuentes miradas de soslayo a su camarada, como si estuviese inspeccionando su estado.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tall Tech-Priest who spoke to you looks more peaceful and makes a point of not drawing his weapon. There is an air of concern about the way he frequently glances over at his fellow, scrutinising his condition.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El imponente tecnosacerdote que te habló parece más sosegado y deja claro que no tiene intención de desenfundar su arma. Se te antoja preocupante el modo en que lanza frecuentes miradas de soslayo a su camarada, como si estuviese constatando su estado.{/n}
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: {n}Seninle konuşan uzun Tekno Rahip, daha huzurlu görünüp silahını çekmemeye özen gösteriyor. Ortağına sık sık endişe dolu bakışlar atıyor ve durumunu inceliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tall Tech-Priest who spoke to you looks more peaceful and makes a point of not drawing his weapon. There is an air of concern about the way he frequently glances over at his fellow, scrutinising his condition.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Seninle konuşan uzun Tekno Rahip daha huzur içinde görünüyor ve silahını çekmemeye özen gösteriyor. Partnerine sık sık endişe dolu bakışlar atıyor ve durumunu inceliyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: Opticon22
